html:
Jan 28 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC AVV.L:

  • AVEVA GROUP PLC - UPDATE RE CFIUS CLEARANCE

  • AVEVA - PARTIES TO ACQUISITION ( PARTIES) WILL ENTER INTO A NEW PERIOD OF UP TO 45 DAYS TO ALLOW MORE TIME FOR REVIEW AND DISCUSSION WITH CFIUS

  • AVEVA - PARTIES AND CFIUS WILL CONTINUE TO WORK TO FINALISE AN AGREEMENT RELATED TO ACQUISITION.

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: AVV.L
